At this point, I haven't played it yet. I've spent around 8 hours trying to get it to work with windows 10.

Puzzleing and funny game will make this a pretty good game. But that's not what makes it a great game. It is it's enviorment, background and it's story. The story is set in an abandoned lab which is called Apeture Laboratories where you play as a character named Chell and fight the antagonist name G.L.A.D.O.S which stands for genetic life and disk operating systems which then kills everyone except for Duogg Ratmann( A.K.A Ratman) which then moves Chell to the top of the test list in hopes of defeating G.L.A.D.O.S in which she did. But also about the enviorment. It may be crammed but with all of the futurisitc areas and the destruction of the place you get a glimpse of something unforggetable. Then the background which shows you easter eggs and some pretty amazing stuff that you may have missed. This game is a mind blower. It's one of the top rated games of our generation and there is a reason why.
AMAZING
Nada que hacer, este juego debe ser jugado por todos. Ambos son muy buenos ^^/
